name: Beat Tiles: Magic Hop
description:
So have you ever played a game to the music beat? Or have you ever imagined music is game? This is the best music games you bump into.

In Beat Tiles – Magic Hop you will come across different genres of music. Lots of hit songs, lots of your favorite songs, lots of instruments: piano, guitar, keyboard, drum, saxophone, violin, electronic, etc.

How to play:
1. Just Finger Play: touch and drag the ball to where you want it to go.
2. On the Tiles: Don’t let the ball miss any tile or bump into obstacles.
3. Make It Musical: Better to put you earphone or head set on, for all the tiles are matched to the music. This will make the play more fun and easier.

Enjoy! And don’t forget to come back every several days. We are committed to updating more songs to Beat Tiles – Magic Hop regularly.
